attributes.action: Change the laws on mothers who deny fathers the rights to see there children
attributes.additional_details: I believe that 1000s of men in the uk are suffering with mental health issues due to the mothers of there children laying the law down and stopping them see there children. Is it fair for loving fathers not to see there children because another parent has a grudge or is upset it is not just the father it’s effects it’s also has massive impacts on the children. #mensmentalhealth #fatherstogether
attributes.background: I wish to start a petition for fathers who are not seeing there children due to the child’s mother stopping them With out good reason or through a court order

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734158
